doc:
Noel Neill https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Noel_Neill 0 Noel Darleen Neill (November 25, 1920 – July 3, 2016) was an American actress. She is known for playing Lois Lane in the film serials Superman (1948) and Atom Man vs. Superman (1950), as well as the 1950s television series Adventures of Superman. She appeared in 80 films and television series in her career spanning 66 years.Following high school graduation in Minneapolis, Minnesota, Neill took up professional acting and modeling in the early 1940s before landing the role of Lois Lane. She later appeared in various productions of the Superman franchise. Frequently cast as the parent or another relative of the main character: Neill appeared in the 1978 Superman feature film, the 1980s TV series Superboy and the 2006 film Superman Returns. Noel_Darleen_Neill ( November_25_,_1920 – July_3_,_2016 ) was an_American_actress . She is_known for playing Lois_Lane in the_film_serials Superman_(_1948_) and Atom_Man_vs._Superman ( 1950_) , as_well_as the_1950s_television_series_Adventures of Superman . She appeared in 80_films_and_television_series in her_career spanning 66_years.Following_high_school_graduation in Minneapolis , Minnesota , Neill took up professional_acting_and_modeling in the_early_1940s before landing the_role of Lois_Lane . She later appeared in various_productions of the_Superman_franchise . Frequently cast as the_parent or another_relative of the_main_character : Neill appeared in the_1978_Superman_feature_film , the_1980s_TV_series_Superboy and the_2006_film_Superman_Returns .
